channel.title: Customization on DoraCloud产品文档
channel.description: Recent content in Customization on DoraCloud产品文档

item.title: Customization
item.description: GoDocs has been built to be as configurable as possible. Change the logo In config.toml you will find a logo variable. you can change your logo there. logo = "images/logo.png" The size of the logo will adapt automatically Change the favicon If your favicon is a png, just drop off your image in your local static/images/ folder and name it favicon.png If you need to change this default behavior, create a new file in layouts/partials/ named head.
